document_data.name: Roasted Eel
document_data.mainbody: '''Roasted eel''' was a simple yet popular dish from the city of [[Arrabar]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Description: [[Eel]], just like [[lamb]] and [[beef]], was a popular food in Arrabar. Eel was eaten buy poor and rich of the city. A simple roasted dish of eel could be prepared in large open-air fire pits. This snake-like fish was roasted and served along with [[pepper]]s and [[turnip]]s.
document_data.History: On [[Tarsakh 13]] of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, roasted eel was served at [[Emriana Matrell]]'s grand sixteenth birthday party, traditional grand event and coming of age celebration. Along with eel, the event was catered with platters of [[saltfish]], [[cheese]]s, heavily spiced and sauced meats and vegetables, as well as a plethora of [[candy]] and [[sweetmeat]]s.
